Summary: If it tastes, looks and smells like honey... it's raw honey!
text:
As soon as you open the jar, you'll know this is the real deal. It just looks right. It tastes right. It smells right. You can tell they're not lying when they call it raw. I love it, and my Aunt who was diagnosed a few months ago with lung cancer (she's ok, thank God) has been taking a spoon or two of this daily. I wouldn't be surprised to find out that the honey, pomegranate, olive oil and just generally healthy, non-processed foods she's been eating exclusively helped her reduce the cancer cells moreso than the medicine the doctor prescribed her.

If you're looking for honey, look no further.
